metadata.title: CVE-2014-9880 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: drivers/video/msm/vidc/common/enc/venc.c in the Qualcomm components inAndroid before 2016-08-05 on Nexus 7 (2013) devices does not validateVEN_IOCTL_GET_SEQUENCE_HDR ioctl calls, which allows attackers to gainprivileges via a crafted application, aka Android internal bug 28769352 andQualcomm internal bug CR556356.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
